Name: Average time from 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' for cases leading to 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time elapsed from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to be followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the review process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the 'SW-Reviewer Declined' after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time it takes 'SW-Reviewer Declined' after the execution of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to be followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time it takes from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to the next 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the manuscript review cycle
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and any subsequent 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in cases leading to 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
